code: import{api}from'./api';export const authorAPI={getAllAuthors:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/authors');return response.data.map(author=>({_id:author.id.toString(),name:author.name,biography:author.biography,birthDate:author.birthDate,nationality:author.nationality,createdAt:author.createdAt,updatedAt:author.updatedAt}));},getAuthorById:async id=>{const response=await api.get(`/authors/${id}`);const author=response.data;return{_id:author.id.toString(),name:author.name,biography:author.biography,birthDate:author.birthDate,nationality:author.nationality,createdAt:author.createdAt,updatedAt:author.updatedAt};},createAuthor:async authorData=>{const response=await api.post('/authors',authorData);const author=response.data;return{_id:author.id.toString(),name:author.name,biography:author.biography,birthDate:author.birthDate,nationality:author.nationality,createdAt:author.createdAt,updatedAt:author.updatedAt};},updateAuthor:async(id,authorData)=>{const response=await api.put(`/authors/${id}`,authorData);const author=response.data;return{_id:author.id.toString(),name:author.name,biography:author.biography,birthDate:author.birthDate,nationality:author.nationality,createdAt:author.createdAt,updatedAt:author.updatedAt};},deleteAuthor:async id=>{await api.delete(`/authors/${id}`);},getAllNationalities:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/authors/nationalities');return response.data;}};
